bootcamp_description: The most modern curriculum, real business projects, and personal career support are possible with us!
overview_text: The Data Science Academy Bootcamp is one of the world's most comprehensive Data Science programs, covering Data Analytics, Visualization, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Big Data. In this program, you will learn Statistics, Data Analytics, and Data Science methodologies using R, Python, Spark, Spark SQL, Spark MLlib, AWS, Hadoop, MongoDB, MapReduce, Hive, Hadoop, TensorFlow, Tableau, SPSS, SPSS Modeler, and many other widely used tools. Most of your time will be spent working on real projects, applying your knowledge, and by the end of the program, you will have created your GitHub Data Science Portfolio. Working with personal mentors, you will have the opportunity to get answers to your questions related to real business problems and datasets. During the bootcamp, you will join our Data Science community, consisting of professional Data Analysts, and participate in various networking events held in the Data Science Space. At the end of the bootcamp, based on exam results, you will receive one of the following certificates: Participant, Data Analyst, Junior Data Scientist, Data Scientist, or Associate Data Scientist. Additionally, you will gain access to individual career services and our CV-Vacancy* database.
overview_sub_text: Our academy provides data and analytics professionals to numerous prestigious local and global companies through collaboration.
requirements_description: Intermediate English, passion for analytics, and analytical skills
extra_requirements: Basic programming and fundamental statistics knowledge is an advantage.
duration_description: 3 months, 3 times a week, each lesson lasting 4 hours with breaks.
location_description: Ashiq Ali 24, opposite Odlar Yurdu University
data_science_bootcamp_desc: Data Science Academy offers you an intensive 140-hour program.
training_program_desc: The only program that jointly teaches R, Python, Spark, Spark SQL, Spark MLlib, AWS, Hadoop, MongoDB, MapReduce, Hive, TensorFlow, Tableau, SPSS, and SPSS Modeler.
mentor_selection_desc: During the bootcamp, in addition to your class hours, you will have meetings with your personal mentor to answer all your questions.
projects_desc: Create your personal Data Science GitHub portfolio based on capstone projects to showcase your knowledge and skills.
career_support_desc: Get one-on-one career support to design your CV and LinkedIn profile, participate in mock interviews, and gain exclusive access to job opportunities with our partner companies.
community_desc: Join our community of professional Data Analysts and participate in various networking events in the Data Science space.
training_info: The e-Government Development Center, Pasha Bank, Bakcell, International Bank, and Access Bank have selected books and created real business and analytics cases by our experts. The program is regularly updated taking into account market trends and business requirements. This program will cover 140 hours of educational content, including teaching Statistics, Data Analytics, and Data Science methodologies using R, Python, Spark, Spark SQL, Spark MLlib, AWS, Hadoop, MongoDB, MapReduce, Hive, Hadoop, TensorFlow, Tableau, SPSS, and SPSS Modeler.
training_step_1_desc: Before the bootcamp starts, your knowledge and skills will be tested and directed to appropriate training programs.
training_step_2_desc: You will learn about Data Analytics, Visualization, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Big Data using one of the world's most comprehensive Data Science training programs.
training_step_3_desc: Together with your personal mentor, you will work on real projects and apply the knowledge you have learned.
training_step_4_desc: You will meet with professional Data Analysts and HR specialists, have one-on-one discussions, and gain access to the CV-Vacancy database.
training_step_5_desc: The world has gained a new Data Scientist.
